definition: relatively low in price or charging low prices
details:
adjective
- relatively low in price or charging low prices
= example: relatively low in price or charging low prices
= synonyms: inexpensive
- embarrassingly stingy
= synonyms: chinchy, chintzy
- of very poor quality
= synonyms: chintzy, tinny, sleazy, bum, cheesy, crummy, punk
- tastelessly showy
= synonyms: loud
